company.name: Phil Mauer & Associates
company.description:
Phil Mauer & Associates is an independently owned Canadian business incorporated in 1993. We offer a variety of services including design, fabrication, prototyping, manufacturing, paint and assembly.

Contact our dedicated sales staff today to answer all your questions about how Phil Mauer & Associates can help you with your challenges. Whether its design, manufacturing, repair, or modification, let our team find the right solution for you.
